## AdapterInterface.findAll() method

Find all the documents from the database

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
findAll(options?: any): Promise<Datamodel[]>;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  options | any | <i>(Optional)</i> Object containing options. Options may be database specific. |
